---
title: 工具链接
---

```{r}
#| echo: false

library(pixture)

paths <- c(
  "https://openbiox.github.io/Bizard/images/ToolLinks/Hiplot.png",
  "https://openbiox.github.io/Bizard/images/ToolLinks/ggalign.png",
  "https://openbiox.github.io/Bizard/images/ToolLinks/UCSCXenaShiny.png"
)

title <- c(
  "Hiplot",
  "ggalign-gallery",
  "UCSCXenaShiny"
)

describe <- c(
  "Biomedical Data Visualization",
  "Integrative Composable Visualization",
  "UCSCXenaShiny Hub Shiny App"
)

link <- c(
  "https://hiplot.cn/",
  "https://yunuuuu.github.io/ggalign-gallery/",
  "https://shiny.zhoulab.ac.cn/UCSCXenaShiny/"
)

captions <- paste0(
  "<div style='line-height:0.1;'>",
  paste0("<div style='font-size:1.0rem;margin-bottom:0.2em;line-height:1;color:#34495e;'><b>", title, "</b></div>"),
  paste0("<div style='line-height:1.2;font-size:0.7rem;color:#808b96;'>", describe, "</div>"),
  "</div>"
)

pixgallery(
  path = paths,
  caption = captions,
  caption_valign = "below",
  caption_halign = "center",
  link = link,
  h = "280px",
  w = "150px", 
  border_radius = "10px",
  gap = "10px",
  layout = "grid"
)
```
